name: Daniel Campbell
text: Did a good job at a reasonable price.

name: Cynthia Wilson
text: This is my go to company for carpet cleaning! Excellent service!

name: jolene Crabtree
text: Great guys and professional

name: Tinderly Johnson
text: Steve was awesome.  He did an excellent job.  This was the second time he's come out to clean our carpets.  The first time was about 4-5 years ago and he did even better this time.  We chose Chem-Dry again because of Steve's professionalism, punctuality and excellent service.  He did a great job last time and did even better today.

resp.text: Tinderly, we truly appreciate your comments and continuing to use our cleaning service. Steven does work hard and cares about the work he does. Thank you for choosing Huntsville Chem-Dry.

name: E A
text: Stephan was very detailed and professional in the process

resp.text: Thank you Eric for choosing Huntsville ChemDry to clean your sofa. I hope you had a great holiday weekend. Tara

name: Danielle Dillon
text: Stephan did a great job on our carpets! We will definitely use him again!

resp.text: Thank you for choosing Huntsville ChemDry. Have a wonderful holiday weekend. Tara

name: Linda Muzquiz
text: I am so lucky to have found Huntsville Chem-Dry!! From the moment I contacted them using their online contact form, I have been impressed with their responsiveness and ease of scheduling the pick up and return of my carpets. I had two runners and a large round carpet cleaned, I have two beautiful dachshunds so I had them cleaned for possible urine stains, just to be on the safe side… To my delight, they contacted me just 5 days later to let me know my carpets were cleaned and ready to be returned! I was expecting a couple of weeks based on experience with other rug cleaning companies. I will definitely be using their services again and again and highly recommend them!! They were a joy to work with, very sweet and friendly, and I am a very satisfied customer!!

resp.text: Thank you Linda. I know the dogs will be happy to have their rugs back to play on and under!  Speaking with you today made my day. Thank you for your service and congratulations on your upcoming retirement. Cheers to your next adventure!  Tara

name: Taylor Walding
text: We bought a house that previously had 2 dogs and a cat in it, but we don’t have animals because I’m allergic. Hence calling in the professionals to clean before we moved in. What kind of carpet cleaning company doesn’t vacuum first? I paid nearly $500 to have my carpets cleaned and there was pet hair left everywhere afterward. The owner and the local guy were rude to me on multiple occasions. I had to follow up several times to get them to come back and fix it. I was originally quoted $350 which ended up being $450 when he arrived. That’s fine - but then they refused to correct the problem at no charge. I told them that was fine, but I’d be leaving a negative review to warn others. After several back and forths, they finally caved and he agreed to vacuum again. He then refused to vacuum the upstairs (which was about half the job) claiming “it looks fine to me.” He then had the audacity to complain to me about “getting him in trouble” by telling the owner he gave me the sanitizer for free. How was I supposed to know he wasn’t allowed to do that? I figured that was a nice bonus they occasionally threw in free. If he got in trouble, that’s the natural consequence of his voluntary actions - not my fault for mentioning it on the phone while trying to sort things out. Pretty bad experience overall, but the carpets are clean now.

resp.text: Taylor, thank you for your feedback. I am glad that the technician was finally able to get back out there for you. I do apologize for putting you in that awkward situation after you said that he gave you free sanitizer and you left him a tip. I don’t have a problem that he gave you the free sanitizer but that should have been in his notes so I was aware None of that was your fault at all and again I apologize.

name: Tina Close
text: Steven arrived early and was extremely efficient. Great results and would definitely utilize this business again.

resp.text: Tina, thank you for choosing Huntsville ChemDry to clean and sanitize your carpets. We truly enjoy being the healthy home experts for our clients and their pets. Have a great week!  Tara

name: Karen Ogrady
text:
From the minute Stephan came to my home he was professional and so very knowledgeable
I will definitely be calling him back
Such a pleasure

resp.text:
Thank you Karen.  I'm glad we were able to take care of your carpet cleaning so quickly.  Have a wonderful week.
Tara

name: Rhonda Stoner
text:
Tara was welcoming and professional from the moment she answered the phone. I had used Chem Dry in Decatur before they closed the Decatur office. Normally the Huntsvile franchise does not service Decatur, but Tara came up with a solution. We also cleaned the carpet at my husband’s office while they were in our area.

Stephen, the technician was professional and kind, plus he worked hard to ensure he got several stubborn stains out of our carpet.

I highly recommend Huntsville Chem Dry.
The cost was worth every penny I spent.

resp.text:
Thank you Rhonda for your kind words. No one ever mentions me in the reviews just the cleaning that we do so you just made my day!!  Let me know when you’re ready for your tile cleaning. Have an amazing day.
Tara

name: Bryan L Gassaway
text: My wife and I have been using Chem-Dry for many years.  We love how their professionalism, promptness, and value.  Their technicians discussed which stains are be hard to remove at the beginning (to set expectations) and tried their best to remove them.

resp.text: Bryan, thank you for trusting in Huntsville Chem-Dry and choosing our service and we hope to service you again in the future.

name: Robyn Gallagher
text: I will tell you I have used other companies for my carpets and tile and has been awful. Stephen came over and was amazing! Was so kind and explained exactly what he was going to do. Did a perfect job. Won’t use anybody else but Huntsville Chem Dry for sure.

resp.text: Thank you Robyn. We’re so happy you chose Huntsville ChemDry to make your home a clean & healthy environment. Have a great weekend.

name: Paula Smith
text:
I was very pleased with the service provided by Chem-Dry. Tim and Stephen did an awesome job removing and cleaning a polish build up from my tile floors. Thanks, for the prompt, courteous, and professional service. I would highly recommend Chem-Dry.

Paula Smith

resp.text: Very happy we could take care of that for you. Over counter polish is applied all the time to natural wood floor, engineered wood floor and LVT by mistake. It may look good or great for a little while but eventually it will break down or look hazy. Once you start the polish hamster wheel it’s hard to get off. We can safely remove the polish and return your flooring to its natural original condition. You being a realtor I’m sure you may see this in homes and very common, now you know it can be fixed!  Thank you for choosing Huntsville Chem-Dry!

name: Reginald Snell
text: We were lucky enough to get Steve to perform the service of cleaning and sealing our tile and granite. He was very hard working, professional and personable. Thank you ChemDry!

resp.text: Thank you Reginald. I’m so happy that we were able to seal the tile/ grout and granite countertops for you and Audrey. Have a great day.

name: Sergio Flores
text: I needed my carpet cleaned  and I thought I give them a call and got say they did a great job. Spotless and great service

resp.text: Sergio, thank you for trusting Huntsville Chem-Dry to take care of the spots and spills in your carpet. Always know were here for you anytime.

name: Erin
text: I was very happy with the service provided by ChemDry. Making the appointment was easy. They were straightforward when explaining their services. The technician, Stephan, called me when he was on his way, which minimized my time away from work. He was friendly and thorough when conducting the walk-through and explained exactly what he would be doing. I was very pleased with the results. No complaints.

resp.text:
Thank you so much.  I also really appreciate that you called today to make sure you got the technician's name correct.  I will make sure he sees this.  Have a great evening.

Tara Outson
Owner, Huntsville ChemDry

name: Maria Huck
text: Stephan did a great job on my carpet and sofa. He arrived on time and was courteous and respectful.  Will definitely use again.

resp.text: Hi Maria, we are so pleased you chose to use our cleaning company. For future reference we also clean hardwood floors, area rugs and tile. Thank you for choosing Huntsville Chem-dry.

name: Glenette Brodzinski
text: I read online about how Chemdry could remove pet odors out of carpets. I read reviews of how great they do. I looked at the ads for discounts and specials. $39. A room, 50% off of pet odor treatment!  Sounded great. I called and explained that I have 4 area rugs that needed pet odor cleaning. That three of them are very inexpensive synthetic rugs and one was a little better grade, wool rug.  She took just a minute to give me a quote. With my 50% off special, it would only be $2600. !!!  WHAT!  I could buy bigger better then I have rugs for that price!!  I have a company that I have used before that picked up and returned, did a great job, for $300. a rug. These rugs are not worth that cost!  Much less over $600 per rug!! AND THATS THE 50% OFF price! God help anyone that needs to clean their rugs when they don’t have a special on!!  No thanks. I can buy new rugs for that price!!!

resp.text:
Glenette, I am sorry that we were not able to help you when you called today for an estimate.  The $2600 was to clean and remove the pet urine odor out of 5 large rugs.  The cleaning of rugs is much different than carpet cleaning and urine removal.  We cannot clean rugs with pet urine in the home as you do not want your hardwood floors to get wet.  In our facility the rugs go through many steps to be cleaned properly (dusting machine, submersion bath, centrifuge, hung in drying room and then any fringe is repaired).  I do understand that our cleaning method is more expensive than what some people pay for synthetic rugs.  As I stated on the phone earlier today, please do not let someone treat the urine issues in our home.  You want to protect your hardwoods.  Enjoy the rest of your weekend.

Tara Outson
Owner, Huntsville Chem-Dry

name: jennifer vinson
text: We were so pleased with the results of our cleaning!  Even though there were several stained areas which required more detailed cleaning, the carpet was dry within a few hours. Would recommend Chem-Dry to anyone.

resp.text: Jennifer, glad you were pleased with the cleaning! We are used to tackling the tough stains, if we can't get them out, no one else can. It was a pleasure working for you and hope to again in the future. Thank you for choosing Huntsville Chem-Dry for your carpet cleaning needs.

name: Michel Bouvier
text: Our carpet had been cleaned once before using a dry process but the result was less than satisfactory. The Chem-Dry cleaning process proved to be much better then the previous dry process. All the spots that the dry process could not removed were removed and did not return using the Chem-Dry process. Also, the carpet once cleaned had no smell or visible residue and was dry within 2 hours. We are very satisfied and will call on Chem-Dry to clean our carpets in the future.

resp.text: Michel, thank you for choosing Huntsville Chem-Dry and just to clarify, our cleaning process is a wet clean but we use a lot less water than many steam cleaning companies and still provide a deep extraction cleaning pulling out the moisture we put into the carpet with our advanced cleaning equipment and amplified extraction. The moisture that does remain dries in about 2 to 3 hours.  And we never leave any kind of soap or residue in your carpet so this cleaning should last a lot longer for you. Once again it was a pleasure meeting you and we hope to be of service to you again in the future. Maybe your upholstery next time! Thank you.

name: Kay Lewis
text: The service I received from Chem-Dry Huntsville was superior. The technician arrived on time, offered me advice on products and services, but was not hard sell. He worked diligently for more than 2 hours and then left without a trace, except for my sparkling clean and fresh carpet. I will definitely use Chem-Dry again.

resp.text: Kay, thank you so much for your kind words.  I will make sure I let Adam know what you said about him.  Have a great day.

name: jennifer vinson
text: We were so pleased with the results of our cleaning!  Even though there were several stained areas which required more detailed cleaning, the carpet was dry within a few hours. Would recommend Chem-Dry to anyone.

resp.text: Jennifer, glad you were pleased with the cleaning! We are used to tackling the tough stains, if we can't get them out, no one else can. It was a pleasure working for you and hope to again in the future. Thank you for choosing Huntsville Chem-Dry for your carpet cleaning needs.

name: Susan Simons
text:
Overall it was a good job of cleaning my carpet that is fairly new but heavily soiled by my dog.  It smells and looks great and Steve worked very hard to clean thoroughly and comply with requests.  He was also fair about giving me the best price he could.  A couple of things I would say could be improved - Steve was not provided anything by Chem-Dry to put under my heavy sofas to protect the legs since those could not be moved out of the room.  In the past, the company we used had some plastic squares.  Steve used plastic grocery bags from Target that I provided him and one faded the red onto the carpet but it is in an obscure place that is not noticeable.  Also it would seem ideal to have 2 people working the job vs. one because of better control of the long hoses, etc. which dripped some moisture and dirt from someone else's house onto my hardwood foyer.  Not preferred but not a big deal either.  Also, I signed the paperwork at the end without reading the words written, just the price.
Later, my husband read it and asked me why the work was not guaranteed against the stains coming back, etc.  I plan to call and ask them about that.  Hopefully the stains won't come back so a moot point.
I would recommend just the basic cleaning plus any pet stain treatment for rooms that might have pet soiling.  The basic formula is supposedly with baking soda and that is truly all natural.  There were options to buy two add-ons in the cleaning formula - an anti-microbial spray and a scotch-guard product.  I opted out on these 2 and don't think there were beneficial.  In fact have read that scotch-guard can be harmful to health.
Also, if you are expecting this service to have very little moisture after cleaning, not really so.  Even un-pet-treated rooms needed overnight to completely dry to move furniture back and my cleaning started at 11:00 am ish.
Have a great day!

resp.text:
Susan, Thank you for your comments & for choosing Huntsville Chem-Dry to serve you.  We always strive for 5-star reviews but we welcome the opportunity to learn & improve from other reviews.  Your input is very valuable.  I want a take a minute or two to clarify a few things.
It is standard that we provide plastic tabs for furniture legs so I am embarrassed to hear that we did not have them on the van that day.  Plastic bags are not acceptable & I apologize for the inconvenience.
We run one man crews on the van to help keep the cleaning costs lower for our customers.
Our paperwork & signature is an agreement confirming our price before the work begins & our agreement that we will do everything we can to remove stains but we cannot guarantee complete stain removal.
We do have 3 packages to choose from, our Basic Cleaning, our Stain Fighter Package & our Healthy Home Package.  Our Chem-Dry proprietary cleaning solution is called The Natural.  It is not like baking soda but it is a Green-Certified cleaning agent.  It is a wonderful product that does not leave a dirt attracting residue and has amazing cleaning abilities while still being safe to drink (tastes awful though)!  Our Stain Fighter package consists of co-applying the stain protectant (another Green-Certified product called PowerGuard) with the cleaning.  Scotchguard is a brand of protectant that is toxic but we pride ourselves on using safe products for the home.  Re-applying stain protectant is very important to extend the look of your carpets.  The original protectant wears off over time with vacuuming and normal activities.  You mentioned that yours is fairly new so it's always good to re-apply once a year on average, this will make cleaning up spills or muddy paws so easy on you in between professional cleanings.  Most companies spray some kind of protectant on the carpet after cleaning which creates a crusty top layer.  Our co-application of the protectant allows us to protect the entire carpet fiber, not just the top.  Our Healthy Home package is the combination of the cleaning, the protectant and an Ant-Microbial pre-spray which removes bacteria in the carpet (especially if there are pets).
Results can vary with drying times in carpet depending on how dirty it is and what kind of carpet it is.  2-3 hours is average but we run our cleaning machine until the carpet is clean without soaking the carpet pad & we use a powerful extraction method for the best possible results.
Again, thank you Susan for your recommendations & please let me know if I can help in any way.

Tara Outson
Owner, Huntsville Chem-Dry

name: Cindy Stewart
text: Chem-Dry made our ten year old carpet look brand new.  I was very impressed by the professionalism and expertise of our technician that cleaned our carpet.  I recommend them to anyone who needs cleaner carpet.  We decided to let them clean our carpet yearly after this great job!

resp.text: Cindy, we thank you so much for choosing Huntsville Chem-Dry and recognizing the difference, comparing our cleaning process to other companies. We hope to serve you for years to come!

name: E A
text: Stephan was very detailed and professional in the process

resp.text: Thank you Eric for choosing Huntsville ChemDry to clean your sofa. I hope you had a great holiday weekend. Tara

text:
I am very pleased with the cleaning of my carpet.
The carpet was not wet, all the stains were removed and the carpet was only moist when the job was completed.  Your service person was very professional, knowledgeable and  attentive to the job.  He was late for the appointment due to the fact that he was the only service person and some jobs ahead of my appointment  took him longer than expected.

I recommend the company to have more service persons in my area.

resp.text: Carolyn, Thank you for your comments and input. We do apologize our technician was running late that day but that can happen occasionally. We hope to be of service to you in the future as well and thank you for choosing Huntsville Chem-Dry.

text: We were lucky enough to get Steve to perform the service of cleaning and sealing our tile and granite. He was very hard working, professional and personable. Thank you ChemDry!

resp.text: Thank you Reginald. I’m so happy that we were able to seal the tile/ grout and granite countertops for you and Audrey. Have a great day.

name: Jacke James-Raines
text: Excellent job by Chem-Dry!  I requested a quote and service and received both in the same day.  That was totally unexpected and very much appreciated!  Scott did an excellent job on the carpet and helped with an awful odor and fabric stains on a couch skirt.  Overall superb job--BRAVO!

resp.text: Thank you for your business for your upholstery cleaning needs from Huntsville Chem-Dry.

name: Ann Tippie
text: Aaron Johnston arrived on time and did a fantastic job of cleaning my furniture. He was very concerned about a couple of pieces, as to whether the colors would bleed. He moved the chair and sofa in my family room on top of the area rug to clean them. This was to protect my wood floors. Afterward, he cleaned the rug. He was very personable and I believe a great representative for your company.

resp.text: Thank you for recognizing the extra efforts our staff will take to provide a quality home service, from Huntsville Chem-Dry.

name: Linda Underwood
text: Customer service was great and the work and tech was excellent..  I was quoted $200 over original quote and did pay$100.00 over original quote over the phone.  That was for a standard couch ,love seat and chair plus a small lobby type couch..  I can no longer afford the services and I have supported Chem Dry for many many years ..$300.00 is just too much for what I needed done.

resp.text: Linda, we do appreciate your business over the years and I think there maybe some confusion as to what was discussed on the phone and what was added on during the appointment which did increase the price. Cleaning upholstery is something we do very well, and it is detailed and time consuming. We clean some upholstery that other companies turn down and we still get very good results so the pricing for this kind of service is at a premium.

name: Corey Jobman
text: Scott was the man that arrived on time and was very friendly. Everything was explained very well about how the cleaning process worked and makes me wish I would have used them a long time ago. My carpet looks and feels very clean. The carpet took about 3 hours to dry but never really felt too wet anyway. This was a much better service experience from Chem-Dry than what I have used in the past and I will only use them from now on.

resp.text: Thank you for trusting Huntsville Chem-Dry in your home and we hope to serve you again in the future!

name: Plothole
text: Got a new house with a previous cat owner. After a quick call to Chem Dry the next day the house was cleaned and my allergy friend couldn't even tell I cat had ever lived here. They do great work and very fast as well!

resp.text: Allergy relief is our specialty along with pet odor removal. Our deep extraction cleaning process is powerful and very effective compared to the cleaning process from other companies. Thank you!

name: Logan Robinson
text: Great service!  I have my carpet cleaned on a regular basis and am most pleased with Chem-Dry.  Scott was on time, very thorough, and did an excellent job.  I will definitely use them again.

resp.text: Logan, thank you for using our service. It's wonderful to have you as a repeat customer, Thank You!

name: Cindy Stewart
text: Chem-Dry made our ten year old carpet look brand new.  I was very impressed by the professionalism and expertise of our technician that cleaned our carpet.  I recommend them to anyone who needs cleaner carpet.  We decided to let them clean our carpet yearly after this great job!

resp.text: Cindy, we thank you so much for choosing Huntsville Chem-Dry and recognizing the difference, comparing our cleaning process to other companies. We hope to serve you for years to come!

name: Janice Mullen
text: Recently had our carpets cleaned by Chem-Dry and they all looked great.  Aaron  was very polite and answered all our questions about the process.  We will definitely use them again if needed.

resp.text: Janice, We thank you for choosing our company Huntsville Chem-Dry, and we hope to be your go to company for years to come. We also clean upholstery, oriental rugs, also tile and grout. You can also expect to receive a 10% automatic repeat customer discount for your next service. Thank You!

name: Steven B.
text:
Steve did a fantastic job of cleaning my carpets of the house I just bought. I called Chem-Dry up at 8:07 am on a Saturday and by 11:30 he was there. I showed him the rooms, he measured, we agreed upon the very reasonable price, and he got to work.

He was done in about 1.5 hours from start to finish and the carpets look great. No residue and the carpets were dry in under 3 hours.

I've used other services in the area to clean my carpets but Chem-Dry did the best job!

10/10 WILL USE THEM AGAIN.

Thank you!

resp.text:
Thank you so much Steven.  Good luck in your new home.

Tara

name: Carmen Hurter
text:
Edit to original post. Since leaving my review ChemDry did contact me and sent someone out to re-clean the areas at no charge. I appreciate the customer service in addressing the review and trying to make us happy with the experience. Thank you!

The service provided was good however we were less than impressed with the results. My husband and I did some of the floors ourselves by hand before we hired ChemDry and those actually turned out better and lighter than having them professionally cleaned. For almost $700 we were hardly able to tell a difference. Most disappointingly, ChemDry contacted me asking me to leave a review. I contacted them back letting them know our issues hoping someone would reach out if they actually cared about my mediocre experience. After waiting 2 weeks I decided to go ahead and post about it here because they never reached out.

resp.text: Carmen,  I did leave a message that very day to see what we could do.  I left it with the number ending in ..43.  I am very sorry, maybe I have the number incorrect in the computer.  I will email you.  Thank you for this feedback.

name: Niki Ward
text: He was really great - nice young man and very professional. My sofa and carpets look brand new!!! I highly recommend Chem-Dry!

resp.text: Thank you for allowing us to provide service to you. We send out a reminder card in 6 months as a reminder for your carpet cleaning or upholstery cleaning needs.

name: Tom Lockard
text: Excellent job had house that belonged to my uncle and carpet was in real bad shape Chem Dru got it clean amazing job looks better than I hoped it would ; highly recommend if you need carpet cleaning service

resp.text: Tom, thanks for choosing Huntsville Chem-Dry and glad we saved you potentially thousands of dollars from having to replace the carpet.

name: Gina Barlow
text: Steven did a fantastic job.   Not only did he remove the stain out of a chair, he explained the process thoroughly and was very professional, courteous and respectful.

resp.text:
Gina,

Thank you for choosing Huntsville Chem-Dry. Stephen is our top technician with over 15 years of experience and he does such a great job. He is also experienced in carpet stretching and repairs.

name: Tonya Walls
text: After the cleaning, a nice clean scent engulfed the entire office! Very pleased with the results!

resp.text: Glad we could help your situation, just a note we did apply a deodorizer for the cleaning, normally our cleaning process is odorless. But all of our products are Eco friendly as well.

name: Debbie Price
text: Great customer service, very knowledgeable and I'm very pleased.  I will be using Chem-Dry again the next time I need it.  Thanks!

resp.text: Thank you Debbie for choosing Huntsville Chem-Dry. It was nice meeting you and we will see you next time.

name: Shirley Sampayo
text: Excellent work done by the tech. He was respectful and knowledgeable.

resp.text: Thank you for choosing Huntsville Chem-Dry!

name: Melissa Smith
text: I tried to get a quote from Chem-Dry recently that left me with a negative impression of the company. I'm not quite sure what went wrong, but the owner, who answered the phone, was brusque and acted as if I was wasting her time... although I spent less than 3 minutes talking to her and only inquired about 2 things. I have a medical condition that makes it hard to speak quickly or process the speech of others, maybe that's where we got off on the wrong foot. Anyway, I tried to ask about the price for one room and a couple of other spots throughout the house. I was confused when she told me the price would be $135, as the website says a living room is $55. I asked her about it, and she told me the minimum is $135. That would have been fine (even though other companies I've called either do not have a minimum or have a smaller minimum), but the attitude behind the comment was if she was talking to a clueless employee rather than a potential customer. Wouldn't you get more customers if you spoke pleasantly and said something like, "I'm sorry about that. Although we'd like to serve as many clients as possible, because of our high quality service, our overhead to come out for less than the price of 3 rooms wouldn't allow us to stay open for business." rather than "No. There's a $135 minimum." in a rather snotty and abrupt tone? Because I had wondered why they weren't listed with the BBB, I asked if they were considering registering with them. I actually wasn't planning on asking about that, but I needed a minute to think after the first part of the conversation went so poorly. Things only got worse. In the same 'you're an idiot, leave me alone' tone, she said "All that means is that you paid them a yearly fee." So after this friendly and pleasant interaction, I told her thank you anyway and hung up. I'd work on my customer interactions if I were this business owner. Who knows, maybe she was having an off-morning, or maybe my voice reminded her of someone she didn't like. Hopefully that's the case and you'll have a more agreeable and satisfying experience than I did.

resp.text:
Melissa,

Thank you for bringing this to my attention.  I really had no idea how I was coming across on our phone call.  I am deeply sorry for that.  Our website does show that if you are getting a living room cleaned that the price for that room is $55.  Underneath that it also shows that our minimum charge is $119.  I will take your suggests to heart and thank you again for letting me know.  I don't ever want anyone feeling that way again.  Have a great weekend.

Tara Outson
Owner, Huntsville ChemDry

They were always prompt and courteous in their response to my e-mails or phone calls. Great to work with. Highly recommend.

resp.text: Hi Miss Sheena, Thank you so much for allowing us to clean for you even though you are out-of-state. We try to make the process of getting your carpets cleaned as easy as possible even if you can't be there. We have a system set up that is totally contactless, so you don't have to be there at all. And, we strive to clean just as good if you are watching or not.  That is why we always take Before & After photos of all our cleanings, and we email them with the Invoice. That way you can see how well our cleaning process works. Thanks so much and we hope to clean for you again! Ann & Steve Mobley

name: ira bornstein
text:
Very good experience from the staff - The carpets are cleaner, and the price was fair. The business' website offered good information, and an easy capability to schedule an appointment.
There was some confusion on arrival as there was an auto-generated "on the way" text sent about three hours prior to the actual arrival which caused some frustration, but that appeared to be an isolated incident.
The technicians also conveyed the value of adding a Scotchgard treatment only to tell me that they didn't have the Scotchgard with them, and then later saying that they found it...I anticipate it may be of value.in the future.
Overall, I'd likely contact them again in the future for carpet cleaning needs.

resp.text: Hi Mr. Bornstein, Thanks so much for reviewing us and explaining your experience. Unfortunately, the Coronavirus situation has affected our busines. We have a couple of our regular technicians out quaratining. We are trying to continue servicing all our appointments with a reduced staff and with new employees. One of our new employees accidentally hit the "on the way" button for your job instead of the job he was supposed to contact and we were unaware this happened. Once we realized this happened, I called you to let you know we had made a mistake. We are not perfect, but we definitley try to fix it if we make a mistake. And, we apologize that our technicians couldn't find the Scotchgard. It was on the van, but they are not familiar with where everything is on the van and couldn't find it. We are sorry for these problems, but thank you for the review and we hope to clean for you again. Sincerely, Ann & Steve Mobley - Owners

name: Haley Bunio
text: Yancy, Steve, and Dillion did a fantastic job! Yancy even hand scrubbed our troublesome stairs. On time, friendly, and thorough. We will definitely use again!

resp.text: Thank you so much for your business and your review Miss Bunio! We strive to be "on-time," and to always do a Fantastic Job. Ann & Steve Mobley

name: DJ Wood
text: Heaven's Best cleaned every floor in the house we just bought. I am overwhelmed!  The whole house smells good, and is ready to move into. The wood floors look amazing. They are in such bad condition that I never imagined they could look so nice and shiny. Other people's carpet is disgusting to me. I would have replaced it if there had been time. I can't believe how clean it looks now.   It is clean enough for the children and I to play in the floor. I feel the same about old tile grout. It looked nasty and germy, but no longer. Heaven's Best actually saved us the cost of replacing floors right now. I can probably wait another year.  I could not be more pleased.

resp.text: Thank you! Thank you Miss Wood! We are so excited that you did not have to replace your floors and we were able to make your carpet & tile clean enough for your children to play on the floors. We love to help our customers get their newly purchased homes clean, fresh and disinfected. We specialize in cleaning carpets and always strive to save our customers from having to replace their carpets.  It is so good to hear that we were able to help. Thank you for trusting Heaven's Best and for giving us such a great review. We hope to clean for you again! Stephen Mobley

name: Sharon Colley
text: Stephen and his crew did an amazing job cleaning my sofa, chair and ottoman.  My movers didn't properly cover my furniture so they were covered with black dirt spots.  The guys cleaned the furniture by hand with spot cleaner and "elbow grease".  My furniture looks brand new!  Very happy with the results.  The guys were nice, polite and very hard working.  Excellent service.  I'm going to have them clean my hard wood floors next!  I highly recommend!

resp.text: Hi Miss Colley,  You have some very beautiful designer furniture and it is frustrating when special items get dirty in a move. We are so glad we were able to make your upholstery look brand new again. Thank you for letting others know that are technicians are nice, polite and hard working. We love to hear this! We want to provide excellent service every time we clean. We appreciate you letting us and others know how we did! Thanks again! Ann & Steve Mobley

name: Sophie Cole
text:
We just had our carpet cleaned by Heaven’s Best and are beyond satisfied with the whole experience. The technicians were extremely friendly and were fantastic at explaining everything they were doing, and taking note at my concerns of existing stains. They were also very sweet to my son and wished him a happy birthday (he just turned 2) and were playing along when he showed them his toys. They were ahead of schedule so they called and confirmed that it was okay that they arrived early. They got the job done fast and the results are amazing. I am so impressed with my carpets and amazed at the appearance of them. They look better than I’ve ever seen them. Like brand new! My whole house smells fantastic, as well. Not like a cleaning solution. I will recommend Heavens Best to everyone! Thank y’all for running such a great company with awesome staff!

-- Sophie C

resp.text: Hi Miss Sophie, We are so excited to hear about your wonderful experience with our technicians and our carpet cleaning. text: This is a family-owned business and it shows!  Excellent communication and attention to detail.  Super friendly. name: Ben Robbins
text: I cannot give them enough praise! We called Heaven's Best to clean our couch. When they got to the house, the staff was extremely helpful and nice. They showed us how to clean it ourselves, because it would be better. By helping us, they did not make any money. It is rare to find people that are honest and truly concerned about what is best. They chose to help us, instead of making a dollar off us. I highly recommend them to anyone!

resp.text: Hi Mr. Robbins, Thank you so much for calling Heaven's Best and for inviting us into your home!  We definitely like to help our customers, and sometimes it requires us to give advice instead of cleaning. Don't get me wrong, we love to clean, but if a professional cleaning is not necessary, we will give you advice so you can do it yourself. We are experts in cleaning carpets, floors and upholstery and so if you have a question about cleaning any of these, definitely give us a call. We can either help you clean it yourself or if a professional cleaning is needed we can provide our services. Thanks again for letting others know that we are honest. We really appreciate it! Ann & Steve Mobley

name: Lauren Young
text: Stephen at Heaven's Best Carpet & Rug Cleaners is hands down the best carpet/furniture cleaning business I have ever used! Stephen let me know up front which rugs/carpet that he did not believe would clean well. Instead of just simply charging me and attempting to clean the carpet, he was honest and told me what I could expect. He even cleaned one rug, and when it did not come completely clean, he did not charge me for it. If you are looking to get your carpets/furniture/rugs cleaned, Stephen is the best. Additionally, he is a dog lover which is great since we have 3 large dogs in the house! He was very friendly with them. I have also asked Stephen about my hardwoods (been in my house for 10 years) and he said he could make them look like new! He will be coming back to do that in a few weeks. :) Thanks Stephen!!

And, I also love dogs!  Thanks for letting others know about our services. We look forward to cleaning and polishing your Hardwoods soon! Thanks! Steve Mobley

text: The Heaven’s Best professionals were very kind and knowledgeable. My carpet looks great! They even managed to get an old ink stain out of my office carpet! I highly recommend. We have used Heaven’s best for several years and wouldn’t change a thing.

name: Jim Parks
text:
I scheduled an appointment with a dry carpet cleaner – arrived in the last seven (7) minutes of the arrival window.  Set-up, started working (note – I did not say cleaning), and after many minutes, the two and a half rooms completed were soaked, and the dirty areas were still dirty.  After washing the spot with brush and cleaner, seeing the difference, I asked him to leave.

Called Heaven’s Best Carpet and Rug Cleaners.  I had “prepped” the whole house for carpet cleaning (furniture up, lighting on, total vacuuming with specific edge cleaning).  That same day, Heaven’s Best came, cleaned our bedroom carpet so we had a place to sleep, returned the next day and completed the entire job.  Two (2) spots did not come completely out, but their cleaning process made a big difference in the carpet’s appearance.  And the two (2) flights of stairs were spectacular.

Use my learning curve; get the right company the first time; save yourself time, money and frustration.

resp.text: Hi Mr. Parks, Thank you so much for calling us after you called someone else!  We are glad we were able to come out and clean your carpets on short notice. We appreciate you taking the time to review us on Google and let others know about our services. Our objective is to always strive to make the cleaning process a pleasurable experience, not a dreaded task. And, we also strive to live up to our name "Heaven's Best" every time we clean. We are so glad we were able to help you out! Thanks again! Ann & Steve Mobley

name: Gaines McMillan
text:
A cat decided to use the restroom on my couch a while back, and the odor would not go away despite a few cleanings with an upholstery cleaner. Steve and a technician arrived exactly when they said they would and quickly diagnosed that cleaning the couch would make the problem worse. I appreciated their honesty instead simply cleaning the couch and leaving. You hope that most companies would do the same, but you never know.

Update 8/25/16:
I used several pet deodorizers on my couch, which made it smell better, but the couch was still stained and smelled a little bit still. As a last resort before giving it away, I decided to Heaven's Best again. They arrived early (better for me), and Steve and his two technicians were just as nice as the first time. I had them clean my couch and chair ($129 special), and they did an incredible job. The couch was pretty badly stained from the various deodorizers I used, but they were able to remove them all. I highly recommend Steve and his team at Heaven's Best and will definitely use them again when needed!

resp.text: Hi Mr. McMillan, Thanks so much for leaving a review for us!  We love to clean for our customers, but sometimes we just can't.  Pet Stains are some of the hardest to get out of upholstery and carpets.  They can be cleaned, but sometimes it is just not worth it if they stains are deep in the upholstery or in the padding of the carpets.  We try to be as honest as we can with our customers, so they can make decisions that will not break their budget.  And, we try to live up to our name "Heaven's Best" every day.  We appreciate you letting others know about how we conduct business.  Thanks!  Ann & Steve Mobley

WOW!!! the before and after pictures say it all...but let me tell you, there are not many service oriented owners in this country anymore - Stephen and Ann kept to their promise and handled the job in a timely and professional manner. HERE'S THE BEST PART .....THEY EXCEEDED MY EXPECTATIONS WITHOUT OVER-CHARGING ME LIKE EVERY OTHER TRADE OUT THERE! I WOULD RECOMMEND THEM TO ANYONE AND WILL BE USING THEM FOR THE REST OF MY LIFE!

name: shan k
text: The lady who answers the phone sounds like she just woke up from a nap...9am, 1pm, 4pm....it doesn’t matter.

resp.text: Hi Shan K, Thanks so much for giving Heaven's Best Carpet Cleaning a 5 Star Review!  We pride ourselves in doing exceptional work for all our customers. I own Heaven's Best Carpet & Rug Cleaners with my husband Stephen Mobley and I do answer the phone most of the time. My name is Ann Mobley and I help my husband Steve run our business. He is out in the field all day and I am in the Office all day. We work extremely hard every day to make the cleaning process easy on our customers. I am on the phone from 7:30am until about 8pm everyday managing our business, and unfortunately I have very bad allergies at this time of year. If it sounds like I just woke up, I apologize. I can promise you I did not just wake up. I run all aspects of our business and I work extremely hard to make sure all of our customers get personal attention. That is why I try to Never Miss a Call. I go from Call to Call to Call, in order to make sure I don't miss anyone. I have very bad allergies and my throat has been extremely sore for the past month.  I am just thankful that I do not have the Coronavirus and that I am able to help our customers get their homes and offices cleaned and disinfected so they, their workers and their families can feel safe. I can promise you I did not just wake up from a nap and that I am doing everything I can to make sure all our customers needs are taken care of.  We appreciate the opportunity to provide our cleaning services for you and all our happy customers.

text: Zerorez did an amazing job cleaning carpets. They look like new.  I saw all the gross water and hair from the carpet from an area our dog doesn’t go. Stains are gone!

name: Mike Alexander
text: I provided this review to the company in Nov 2020 and never heard a word back from them.  It is now Jul 2021 so now I am posting here:  I really did not want to leave this review as I really liked the technician that worked at my house as a person.  And I am not requesting that anything be done to make things right.  I am good at this point.  The job that was done on the tile floors was good (with one exception noted later).  What makes me unhappy is when I have to do work to clean up after a job is done.  I was a bit bothered right away when I noticed that the technician was leaving boot prints everywhere he walked on my hardwood floors on his way to the tile floors he was cleaning.  I didn't say anything as he was just starting, and I thought maybe it would be taken care of.  He worked hard and did a good job on the tile floors (with the one exception I will note later).  Once he was finished and was removing the corrugated water line and the machines, rancid smelling water was spilled in some areas on my hardwood floors.  Also, while pulling the corrugated water line out of the house, he pulled it around the corners of a room scuffing the baseboards.  I had to put my foot between the baseboard and the line so it would stop hitting the baseboard.  This prevented it from doing any noticeable damage.  He did bring in a wet mop and attempted to clean the hardwood area but did nothing more than smear the rancid smelling water around which dried leaving a VERY noticeable film on the floor.  I had to clean a fairly large area of the hardwood floor twice to remove the dried, rancid water and most of the smell.  As noted above (the one exception) I also mopped the tile floors he cleaned with vinegar and water as some of the quarter round in the tile floor area had filth on it and I figured some of that floor probably had some of the same rancid water on it.  The rancid water smell stayed in the house for more than a day.  The second cleaning of the hardwood floors and time got rid of the rest of it.   My bet is that the machines and/or the water line contained the rancid water from other jobs.  I really hate leaving comments like this, but it is probably important that the company be made aware of these type of issues for training purposes.

name: Melody Baker (MissusMellie)
text:
Ed was efficient and professional. He took time to explain what he was doing and how their product works.
Highly recommend!!

name: tim pittman
text: Prompt arrival and quick, professional service. Completely removed the smell of smoke, pets, and general age. Fair price too. Highly recommend.

name: Colton
text: The technician was very professional an was very knowledgeable about his service! We would definitely recommend using them!

name: Denise Hunter-Gilbert
text: We highly recommend Zerorez Huntsville and Technician Ed for their hard work, integrity, and expertise! We had a serious cat urine issue in one of our rooms and Ed explained in detail the treatment that would give us a clean carpet and no urine smell. Zerorez is a multi-step process and we learned a lot about the longterm effects of untreated or partially treated pet urine and the downside of commercial enzyme products. We now know how to spot clean in a much better way. Our cream microfiber chair and all 4 carpets look and smell brand new! The results were well worth the price!

text: Excellent job!  The service technician was timely, friendly, and did a great job.  One of the rooms had several pet stains and he was able to get the stains up and the smell out.  The cost is a bit higher than some others in the area, but I would definitely use them again in the future.  The valpak coupon helped:)

resp.text: Thank you for sharing your Zerorez experience Kathy! And you bring up a great point about our pricing compared to traditional carpet cleaners. It is true that we are not the least expensive carpet cleaner in Huntsville, but our patented cleaning technology does provide a better long term value. The difference is our certified zero residue cleaning process. We will explain: with traditional carpet cleaners, soaps and detergents are combined with hot water extraction to clean and sanitize carpets. And although this is a tried and true process, it has a big problem; it's impossible to get all the soap and detergent out of the carpet. And this soapy residue (which can feel a little crunchy under your feet after drying) ends up acting like a dirt magnet which results in spots and traffic lanes reappearing. But with the Zerorez patented process, we do not use soaps and detergents to clean and sanitize carpets but instead a revolutionary, and completely non-toxic, solution called Empowered Water. This process results in a zero residue cleaning, and without residue, carpets stay cleaner, longer. Additionally, they feel softer than you can imagine. Thank you again for your business and fantastic review! We look forward to seeing you again.

text: Ok so I am looking to get my carpet cleaned again and it reminded me I did not do a review on the service I got with these guys in May. I got charged for the service and the card reader or software was not working on his phone so my card number was manually enter in which is fine until 4 days later I get a charge again for another amount which was manually enter in again which means my information was saved.  I called and spoke with Russell about the issue and he said would call me back...this never happened so I called my card company and they provided me the details about my card information being entered in manually at a different location 4 days later so they transferred me to the fraud department which disputed the charges since they saw this as fraud.  Till this day I have still never heard back from the manager on why this happened or that he was going to issue me a credit.  .......Update Oct 2020:  Wow took you a year to reply and no nothing is inaccurate, try putting a little more time into your reply so people may believe you...never going to use you again anyhow!  I save everything and would be more than happy to post a photo of the transactions and the letter back from my credit card company removing the charge do to the fraudulent charge.

name: Dan
text: I had a car with damage to the front seat and attempted to get an estimate.  Called several times a week for about two weeks with no answer.  The wife finally decided to drive down to the shop to see if we could get find some info in person.  She ended up waiting around for quite a while before someone finally got to her, and the staff seemed rather annoyed that they had to take time out to talk to a customer.  They finally sent someone to look at the car, took some pictures, and told her they would get back to us in a couple days with an estimate.  He was pleasant and professional. That was 24 May. A couple weeks went by and nothing... tried calling multiple times and got no answer.  When someone finally answered, she was extremely unprofessional and quite rude.  We told her our situation, and asked the status of our estimate; she said the one who helped us was new, and that there was no way they were going to get back to us that fast, said it was going to be a while, but couldn't give us any sort of expected response time.  She was snappy, extremely rude, and pretty unprofessional.  19 June and still no response... pretty sure we're headed to Norm's out in Gurley.

resp.text:
Mr. Bryson,
I sincerely apologize for any inconvenience we may have caused. I assure you we have tried our best day in and day out to find another company who could trim down your bed cover since we weren’t able to however we were unable to locate anyone within a 100 mile radius who could get the job done. I’m sorry it had to come to this but hopefully if you cannot get a refund you can find someone with that particular expertise. Thank you for the opportunity and again I do apologize and hopefully one day in the future we can earn back your business.

text: I paid for auto upholstery and carpet to be cleaned I had water stains and dirt but I just feel like the guy did a poor job. He only went thru the front of the seats and not the sides. The carpet didn’t get washed underneath the seats and I’m talking about where you can definitely reach and where it’s visible. So I don’t recommend for cleaning your auto upholstery or carpet.

resp.text: Good afternoon Rocio, we're sorry to see you're unsatisfied with the service. While water stains are certainly on the more difficult side, we can certainly come back to try a second time at no charge. Additionally there should be no missed areas if they are accessible to our technicians. Please call us within ten days of your service and let the agent know that we sent you. They arrived on time, cleaned, deodorized & sanitized & were out the door in short order. No stains on our carpet! We are so happy with them. And our dog is all better too💙

text: On 12/12/2020, SS provided services to our hardwood floors. Before beginning, the floors were examined and we were told what needed to be done in order to give us the results we desired. The service was a bit expensive but we were willing to pay if we received clean and shiny hardwood floors. In the end, SS did an alright job but there is a problem area that looks way worse than it did before they performed services. I called and advised them that we weren't satisfied with the end result. They came out again and applied their SS product to the problem area but it didn't help. That area of the floor still looks horrible today...dull, ashy, and dry. I'm just going to buy a rug and cover it up. We weren't satisfied at all. I gave 3 stars because they previously serviced our carpets and they did a good job.

The price quoted was $317 but changed to $467 because the room was considered as two ( i had told the office it was large). I had worked for two days getting furniture moved so i went ahead and had the tile cleaned and sealed. Big mistake! While the guys were very pleasant,
The work they did was nothing spectacular and certainly wasn’t with over $400.
It was absolutely NOT worth my work and money to have my floor look no better than when i have done it myself with a steamer.
I will not recommend this to friends or family.

name: Jennifer Needham
text: DO NOT USE THEM FOR TILE CLEANING AND GROUT SEALING! Paid for tile cleaning and grout sealing. Crew had to come out 3 times in one day to attempt to fix and finish. First, they forgot to seal the shower that we paid $90 for them to do. Then, we noticed a film all over every single tile that would not come up; Technician did NOT allow the tile and grout to dry before spraying grout sealer..Then, did not wipe off the excess grout sealer, just left it all over each and every tile. 3rd trip out of same day to day to try and fix it, they used every chemical, scrubber machine, everything they had to try and get it off, guess what, didn't work. So now, my grout is wet UNDER the sealer, which never had proper curing time, because they did not let the grout dry before applying, and my tiles have giant stains, splotches, blobs all over every single one because they did not remove the sealer from the tile after spraying the grout. And on top of it, one of the technicians decided that no, all of my white grout was actually completely stained before they got here that's why it's dark (Not because it was wet, which was the case)..He ended up arguing with me and cursing at me. So corporate will be getting a call this afternoon. Floors look 10x worse than what they did before they were out. Mind you, this was over a $450 job.

resp.text: Hi Jennifer, thank you for taking the time to post a review about your recent experience using Stanley Steemer. We want you to know that we value you as a customer and are truly sorry that you have been inconvenienced in this way. We would like to learn more about your experience and to see if there is anything that we can do to restore your faith in Stanley Steemer. Please email us to customerrelations@steemer.com with your address, zip code and phone number associated with your account or contact us at 1-800-783-3637 ext. 4903. Once we have located your account, someone from management will be in contact with you. Thank you again for bringing this to our attention and we look forward to hearing back from you.

text: They need to be more careful with the hoses that come from the truck. Our freshly painted baseboards were damaged and the paint scraped off because those big hoses were scraping against them.

resp.text: Hi Love Pups, thank you for taking the time to bring this to our attention. We do apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused you. We would like to forward this to the managers at your local Stanley Steemer franchise, that way if for some reason they are not already aware of it they can look into this matter and contact you directly. Could you please email us with your zip code, cleaning address and phone number associated with your account to customerrelations@steemer.com or call us at 1-800-848-7496 ext. 4903. Once again, we do apologize for any inconvenience this has caused you and we look forward to looking into this as quickly as possible.

text: I had them come twice.  First time, they cleaned 3 area rugs and worked on grout in bathrooms.  Since the grout did not get really clean,  they came back and basically "painted" the grout white.  It looks great.  They did 3 bathrooms and a laundry room.  It did take a lot longer than I thought it would!  Milton Cawthorne was the supervisor that came both times and he was great!  Very personable and respectful.

name: Rabecca Thomson
text: I have used Stanley steamer to clean my carpet for the last three years. This time two men came they did not want to move any furniture and said they will just go around it. ??? Um no !! I will move the furniture so it can be done right. The younger man had his pants down, hanging off his body. The whole time he was trying to spray the carpet his pants were falling and he could only use one hand. His shoe were not even tied. He did not use shoe cover and went in and out of the house. He was very unprofessional and I am not happy about the cleaning! I use this company because I trust them but never again. I will find someone else. The other man was ok.

resp.text: Good morning Rabecca, thank you for taking the time to bring this to our attention. I had trouble finding your service yesterday because the last name was different but after locating it the management team was made aware of the issue. Rest assured that nothing has changed as far as our standards and it's unfortunate that you got that level of service, but we'll be working hard to ensure it doesn't happen again.

text: They were prompt and on time and called before they arrived as requested. I had the hardwood floor cleaning and after the holidays had glitter and a few stains still on the floor that I couldn't seem to get up and unfortunately they were unable to get it all up as well but my floors were definitely cleaner. The employees were awesome and a joy to work with. I would use them again.

resp.text: Thank you so much for the review Latondra!    I'll be sure to pass this on to the team, and if you'd like us to come out and address those spots again please give us a call within 10 days of the service and there will be no charge.

name: Erin Boles
text: Very quick response time.  I requested carpet cleaning online and the next day, the cleaning crew was here on time, and I'd been given a courtesy call to make sure we'd be here.  Milton and his sidekick James were very courteous and thorough.  Plus, they were quick!  They finished 3 rooms in an hour!  They used plastic bumpers to protect the corners of our walls.  They also cleaned a very nice rug in our entryway.  I was concerned they might say they couldn't take the liability, but they cleaned it beautifully and quickly.  We've used Stanley Steamer for years, but haven't had carpet again until recently, and I'm pleased to say we'll use them again.

resp.text: Thank you so much for your kind words. We really appreciate you taking the time out of your day to share your experience with us. We count ourselves lucky to serve customers like you. We look forward to helping you keep your home clean!

name: Kathy Carter
text:
Customer service was great when I called to schedule my carpet cleaning.  Very friendly and explained all cost and appointment details.  The two men they sent to clean my carpet were extremely nice and professional.  They were knowledgeable of all aspects of the cleaning and answered all of my questions.

Unfortunately, after the carpet dried, many of the stains came back which was very disappointing.  The men told me that they had used the strongest stain remover they had .  It obviously didn't work well enough.

resp.text: Thank you for letting us know Kathy. If you reach out to the office first we would be able to hopefully address the issue before you leave an online review. I'll have a manager reach out to you and set up to have those trouble areas addressed. Please expect a call from 256-883-7800

name: Peggy Moore
text: There were here for 35 minutes.  I was outside when I went in to look the master bedroom was just as dirty from where the furniture was. I am not happy with in.  He brought the paperwork outside and had me sign it and they were gone.will not use again.  I’ve used before, never had that problem

resp.text: Hey Peggy, sorry for the late response on this; there seemed to be an issue with the email alerts for our reviews here! I've passed your information along to the regional management so you should be hearing from someone shortly regarding this issue. Please feel free to follow up here with your experience moving forward.

name: Denise Cook
text:
The very first thing I told the crew was that there were three cats in the house and they were not to be let outside. The next thing I knew they had my door standing wide open. This should have been communicated to me at the time of my warning so I could have locked up the cats at that time rather than going into mass panic.

I guess I was expecting too much from the tile cleaning. Though they spent a good two hours pre treating and then steaming the tiles didn’t look any better from when I used my own home steam cleaner, except in the areas where the washer and dryer previously sat in my laundry room.

resp.text: Hi Denise, thank you for taking the time to post a review about your service using Stanley Steemer. We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused you. We are forwarding your concerns to the local franchise manager. That way if for some reason they are not already aware of it, they can look into this concern. Please email us to customerrelations@steemer.com and include your address, zip code and phone number associated with your account. That way we can be sure we are contacting the correct Stanley Steemer location. Once again, we do apologize for any inconvenience this has caused you and we look forward to looking into this as quickly as possible. Thank you again for choosing Stanley Steemer.

name: Janet W
text: I am blown away at how amazing this company and it's employees are.  I had some damage to my ceramic tile and scheduled an appt over the internet.  The app said they were available at 8AM on Monday (and this was 8PM on Sunday.  I tried scheduling, thinking they would call and say they needed to set me up at another time.  Instead, I got a call at 8:10AM saying a team was on the way.  Dane and his partner were AWESOME.  They were worried that they would not be able to correct the damage I had done,  so Dane went into great detail about what to expect (he did not want me to be disappointed).  After much discussion, I told him to "go for it".  He did a superb job of fixing what I had messed up with his corrective cleaning technique.  He cleaned to rest of the floor sparking clean and fresh.  The results were much better than I expected and I am very happy with his hard work and diligence in making certain I was fully informed about potential upside and downside of the process.  It was quick, convenient and more than lived up to my expectations.  Would give this team and all of Stanley Steemer 10 stars if possible.

name: Darin Bashaw
text: Watch their pricing and get quotes. They are already 50% more than competition for normal service. Deodorant or other add-ons will double the price. And if you dare to ask for tile or other hard surface cleaning and the price will be triple what carpets would cost. I was shocked by that bill. Didn't make sense so I asked and couldn't get a satisfactory reason why the hard surfaces were so much more expensive, except 'that's our price, that's always been our price.' Well these prices just don't seem reasonable to me. Otherwise, can't fault the service. As a commercial company, we need affordable and predictable prices and find these elsewhere.

resp.text: Hi Darin, thank you for taking the time to bring this to our attention. In an effort to stay competitive Stanley Steemer monitors various consumer reports to help determine how their pricing compares. Although our pricing may not always be lower than our competitors, we are confident that they cannot match our quality of service. We are forwarding your concerns along to the managers at the local Stanley Steemer office, that way if for some reason they are not already aware of it they can look into this.

They checked out the areas to be cleaned, asked if we had any special concerns (which we did and they addressed) and they went right to work. In what we considered a short time, they were done and invited us to inspect their work. Asked again if we had any concerns.
10-min later we had paid, they had picked up their equipment and were gone. Painless.
We WILL have these guys back to clean carpets in our motorhome.

name: Carli Parrish
text:
I just purchased a home and wanted the carpets cleaned before I moved my things into the home. I hired Stanley Steemer to come out on the day of closing. I could’ve rented a carpet cleaner from Publix and taken my time to clean my carpets and would’ve had a better result. I thought hiring professionals would save me time and I would have professionally cleaned carpets. Unfortunately that didn’t happen, they rushed and left dirty spots that I later cleaned myself. Not to mention they didn’t touch the areas around the base boards. I wasted over $300!
Update!
I received a call this morning and it’s was explained that my carpets had been neglected and that’s was why the carpets looked unclean. I really appreciate that fact that Stanley Steemer took the time to respond to my complaint!

resp.text: Hi Carli, thank you for taking the time to bring this to our attention. We do apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused you. We are forwarding this information along to the managers at the local Stanley Steemer office that way if for some reason they are not already aware of it they can look into this matter and contact you directly. We have located your account information, to ensure we are contacting the correct location. Please email us at customerrelations@steemer.com (mailto:customerrelations@steemer.com) if you have any further questions or concerns. Once again, we do apologize for any inconvenience this has caused you and we look forward to looking into this as quickly as possible. Thank you again for choosing Stanley Steemer.

name: johnny appleseed
text:
I was very disappointed with the experience we had with Stanley Cleaners. The first problem was the attempts to sell me more and more services, such as anti bacterial treatment etc. Second our house was completely empty because we had just bought it and was having carpet cleaned prior to moving in. So why charge me same price as someone with furniture to move.
Lastly our carpet smells bad now. There was a slight dog odor before but since they cleaned until now (1 week) it really smells like a wet dog. For three average rooms with no furniture to move, they left with a little over 170 dollars.

name: Stacy Strain
text:
We hired them for one couch, one chair, and carpet in a vacant new house. Couldn't be easier. House only one year old. Rep on phone was not polite and not accomodating. When we arrived back after he completed work, there was zero change in the way the carpet looked, we found pins on surface of carpet that a good technician would have found. zero evidence of any cleaning. Called company back. Asked for another rep to come back and they said original rep had to. Company CONTRACTS for their work. Never recommend and never use again.

****ADDITIONS OR RESPONSES after owner response. The Rep referred to was not your wife, but the "contractor" that he said he was doing our carpet. Your wife (or person who scheduled our cleaning) WAS friendly on the phone. If you do not use contractors perhaps the "technician (rep)" shouldn't tell us that.  The stains and lackluster was noticed BEFORE we put any furniture back into the home. Plus, the guy who did the cleaning REQUIRED that we pay prior to the work and to him not the office. Not used to paying prior to work and wont again. Nothing I have said is intentionally false or misleading.  Still highly disappointed in work and don't believe in luck but do thank you for the intended kind ending comment.

resp.text:
UPDATED 10-1-20 after another false claim by Stacy. For anyone reading this....please visit our about us page on our website...https://www.goprosteam.com/about-us/   as you can see Cams' picture and bio are listed and have been on our website for years. Stacy, this is tiring to say the least.  Let me fill you in on a little nugget of information...the technician is not only our employee he is my stepson, so I think we know a thing or two that goes on in our company.  I mean for goodness sake Stacy...we have company vans with our logo, company name, address and phone number plastered all over it with an expensive van wrap...do you think any company is gonna let a "contractor" drive their company vans?  They are not, so again, either you are confused or making this stuff up for whatever reason you have...not sure...maybe you are just having a bad week...still no reason to dump all over us. The reason you were required to pay upfront is because both you and your husband were leaving the house, this is company policy..otherwise if a customer stays they pay after work is completed.  Also...if Cam left a busines card with our logo all over it, it says his title "OPERATIONS MANAGER".  We have already asked Cam about his experience with you, as a matter of fact the only communication he had with you was on the phone when he called to ask a few directions to your home while he was on the way...you were not even there when the cleaning intially started, your husband was...so no Cam has no reason to tell you he is a contractor.  By the way....you did not pay Cam, he carries a credit card reader that is mobile, you were charged by my company...would you like to see a copy of the receipt?  Ive been more than nice to you over this but you keep making false claims.  Again I appreciate your business but please stop this...it is making you look foolish.  Once again we wish you all the luck in your new home.

Hi Stacy.  This is Matt Lowery, co owner and founder of Pro Steam Carpet Care.  First let me say it is unfortunate that you feel the need to leave such a false review of our company.  Secondly here is the url to our about us page on our website  https://www.goprosteam.com/about-us/  as you can see it has Cams' bio on there and states he is our OPERATIONS MANAGER, not a contractor so let me clear some things up for you.  Firstly...the "rep" on the phone is my wife and gets compliments daily on how helpful, resourceful, nice and educated she is, the "rep" that cleaned your carpet and furniture is an employee and has been employed with us for 8 years with zero complaints, only praised because he cares.  We are a family owned business and have been for 30 years.  Secondly...you claim we "contract"  for our work....sorry but that is false and misleading.  We do not use contractors..we use employees.  We refused to send a different technician because your husband called us approx 4 days after the job was completed and after you had moved in due to a "stain" reappearing.  We were more than happy to reservice your carpet at no charge but the technician who originally cleaned your carpet was already familiar with your carpet and had absolutely no problem in returning to satisfy you....I found it odd that your husband called back and canceled the reservice of your carpets.   We do have before and after pics of your furniture, they are like night and day and cleaned up perfectly.  If I am able to post the pics to this response I will.  I do however have a suspicion that since we performed the carpet cleaning BEFORE you moved in that during your moving process there was probably some soiling that occured....this is common, however it is still unfortunate you feel the need to leave a 1 star review.  We agreed to return to reservice your area and you refused.  We are a good, generous and honest company with many certifications and one of the only firms that is insured in the area.  We appreciate your business and wish you luck with your new home.

name: Adrienne G
text:
I have pets, 2 dogs to be exact.  I had friends stuck at my house during the height of COVID-19 with their 2 dogs.  Four animals in an 1100 sqft house for 7 months.  You get the picture.  Guest just left last month and I am still trying to clean up after all have left.  So I decided to refinance my house.  Then I received a call that my home needed an appraisal for my refinance.  Ok, no big deal, except the appraiser would be here in 1 week.  I needed my carpets cleaned FAST.  Panic set in when ALL my normal carpet cleaners in Newnan were unavailable until after appraisal date.  So, I searched for companies in LaGrange and read the reviews.
Pro Steam seemed like the best option.  I called and Ali was able to get me on their schedule same week.   Price was affordable, in my budget and primarily fit my time constraints.  Cam arrived on time, went over the house and was very thorough.   I really appreciated how quick Ali was able to get me scheduled due to extremely tight timeline. I was amazed that the products they used smelled refreshing AND DID NOT bother my sinuses at all!!!   That is saying something because glass cleaner will make my nose burn.  My carpets look like new, all the little "oops" stops are gone, house smells AMAZING.   Cam was here about 2 hours and I was able to continue working while my carpets were cleaned, even had a few calls and no issues at all with noise.
So, if you are looking for carpet cleaners, this local owned company is AWESOME!!!  Thanks, Adrienne G.

text:
We are traveling vendors at the Renaissance Faires. We got set up but it rained that Thursday night and soaked the rug in our tent. I called and spoke to John who was so gracious and wonderful to do the water extraction and dry it over night for a reasonable price.

He went above and beyond to set up a time on Saturday morning, when their shop is normally closed, to meet us so we could pick up the rug and still make in time for the opening of the Renaissance Faire!

I will definitely recommend Veterans Cleaning Solutions for all of our cleaning needs!! Thank you John!! You really saved the day for us!!!

Please let us know if we can ever help you again in the future.  Thanks again.  John

name: J C
text: Ridiculous. First, you play phone tag with a person for a day then they want to come and measure each square foot of carpet to be cleaned which required me to drive 30 miles to the home,which in the end was a waste of time. Then because a 10 foot square area of carpet had some heavy staining this person proceeds to give me an at least $1000 estimate and several days away till job is done! I dont care what you do to a carpet you're not going to get all the stain down into the pad out I don't care what someone tells you,short of replacement. Charging attorney fee rates is ridiculous, you're cleaning carpet for 2 or 3 hours without going to law school for 6 to 8 years. In my opinion he just didn't want to do the job. Also wanted like $1.15 a sq. ft to clean tile with over 500 ft. to be done. Again, it ain't that difficult and those prices must be from New York or Cali. After the rigamaroll I contacted another carpet cleaner,gave the number of rooms and approximate area to be cleaned OVER THE PHONE and they were out that afternoon, did a good job in 3 hours all for about $300.

name: Andrew Godfrey
text:
They cleaned the carpets and they look better than they have vs any other service that has cleaned here. Having said that...

The technician/salesman will show up and try to sell you a ton of services that they will give you a great deal on because they are your friend. Decline all of it. The enzyme treatment, pretreatment, post treatment, etc.seem to largely be imaginary. I signed up for some but they did not modify what they were doing at all.

Also they will not move or clean under any piece of furniture that you do not EXPLICITLY ask them to clean under, so keep an eye on the work and speak up; they wont do anything they don't absolutely have to on their own.

Having said all of that, the carpets look great.

text: Came up to my mother in laws in Daphne and needed to get the house taken care of before we sell it.  Rugs need to be cleaned, sofa and most important the duct work cleaned out.  We called Stanley Steamer of Daphne, what a great deal.  We are so happy with the work the two brothers did to the house.  Both Chris and Dustin did an outstanding job not only with the rugs but the air duct work did wonders.  The air is cleaner and just feels great. Definitely recommend these guys, not only professional but friendly and down to earth.  Great guys and great deal!!
